* Iron Raptor's expression changed from bord to bewildered as Devil Gigatron 
suddenly made the scene, the wind created from his decent flowing over her 
in a wave of dust and pebbles. Billowing her cape out behind her as the 
larger projectiles tinged against her armor plating. Luckily, however, she 
had pulled up her helm and now any facial features were hidden behind a 
pitch black facial plate.  Though her steady stance didn't shift in the 
slightest as his large shadow decended upon the pair of Maximals, if she 
could say the same for AzureBlade...she didn't know.
Crossing armored arms across her chest, Iron looked up with an unimpressed 
glint in her eyes as Devil Gigatron's words were spoken.
Lifting a brow of her own from behind the heavy helm.
<...Roody poos???>
The heavily clad figure of the Maximal Commander shifted her weight to one 
foot and tilted her head to the side.
This guy didn't sound serioise.*

" I ' in the great gods behind' am Arkness Prime/ Iron Raptor. Maximal 
Commaner."

* It was a long shot but there was no harm in stating her new name, as the 
Matrix decreed.
But then Iron tilted her head towards her companion.*

" This is AzureBlade. My representative."
